thread.title: These mother & daughter photos prove the apple doesn’t fall far from the tree (16 Photos)
thread.title_full: These mother & daughter photos prove the apple doesn’t fall far from the tree (16 Photos)

author: Bob
title: These mother & daughter photos prove the apple doesn’t fall far from the tree (16 Photos)
text:
View as Slideshow 1 
These beautiful daughters are an absolute spitting image of their mothers. What a mind trip it must be to recognize yourself in your own child. Like, spoiler alert, kid, I know exactly how you’re going to turn out looking…YERRR WELCOME!! 2 
Mom on the left and her daughter at the same age on the right. 3 
The Mahomes twin sisters, with their 35-year-old mom . 4 
And one more image of the 3 for good measure. Seriously, who is the mom for the love of God?! 5 
Actress Polina Maximova, 27, with her mother, Svetlana, 50 (left) Advertisement
